data.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
data.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

data.quote: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
data.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

data.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate, to have it make some difference that you have lived and lived well.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
data.author: Confucius

data.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
data.author: Walt Whitman

data.quote: You have to be odd to be number one.
data.author: Dr. Seuss

data.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
data.author: John Lennon

data.quote: Get busy living or get busy dying.
data.author: Stephen King

data.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: I think, therefore I am.
data.author: René Descartes

data.quote: An eye for an eye only ends up making the whole world blind.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
data.author: Henry David Thoreau

data.quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
data.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

data.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
data.author: Socrates

data.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
data.author: Sam Levenson

data.quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
data.author: Confucius

data.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: Life isn’t about waiting for the storm to pass, it’s about learning how to dance in the rain.
data.author: Vivian Greene

data.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
data.author: George Eliot

data.quote: We do not remember days, we remember moments.
data.author: Cesare Pavese

data.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
data.author: Frank Sinatra

data.quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
data.author: Dr. Seuss

data.quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
data.author: Helen Keller

data.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: There are no limits to what you can accomplish, except the limits you place on your own thinking.
data.author: Brian Tracy

data.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
data.author: William James

data.quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
data.author: Bo Bennett

data.quote: Every man is guilty of all the good he did not do.
data.author: Voltaire

data.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt

data.quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
data.author: Oscar Wilde

data.quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
data.author: Ronald Reagan

data.quote: To be great is to be misunderstood.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
